PageObject.StaticText:
This area of the data reconciliation application lets you define the flows and compositions for which measurements are available and their accuracies. The accuracies form the key numbers in computing the correct reconciled flows and compositions.
You must provide the accuracy by specifying the (estimated) mean and standard deviation of the distribution of the absolute (or relative) error in all measured values. The error in a measurement is defined as the reconciled value minus the measured value.
The buttons on the right will bring you directly to the relevant pages for specifying your knowledge about the measured data.
When entering a new data reconciliation model you are advised to enter the data in sequence.
